summary: This is a letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center regarding the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. It references the transfer of discovery materials pertinent to Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, for whom discovery materials are being transferred.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York who signed the letter.

connections.description: Strauss, as Acting U.S. Attorney, is part of the prosecution team handling the criminal case against Maxwell.

events.title: Transfer of Discovery Materials
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office sends discovery materials pertinent to Ghislaine Maxwell to the Metropolitan Detention Center.

locations: The Silvio J. Mollo Building, One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
MDCâ€”Metropolitan Detention Center, 80 29th Street, Brooklyn, NY 11232
keyFacts: The document is a formal communication from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
It confirms the transfer of discovery materials to the detention center where Maxwell is held.
Audrey Strauss was the Acting U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York as of December 2020.
The case reference (20 Cr. 330) indicates it is a 2020 criminal case.
